```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(skimr)
```

```{r}
mack_verts = read_csv(here::here("data", "AS00601.csv"))

skimr::skim(mack_verts)
names(mack_verts)

mack_verts = janitor::clean_names(mack_verts)

```
```{r}
mc_wt_5 = mack_verts$WEIGHT[5]

mc_wt_5

mc_length_8_20 = mack_verts$LENGTH1[8:20]
mc_length_8_20
mc_dates = mack_verts$SAMPLEDATE

mc_dates
```

```{r}
mc_salamanders = mack_verts %>% filter (species == "DITE")

mc_salamanders

ggplot(data = mc_salamanders, aes(x = length1, y = weight)) + geom_point(aes(color = species)) +
  labs(title = "Pacific Giant Salamanders  Weight vs Length", subtitle = "species Dicamptodon tenebrosus")

ggsave(here::here("figs", "ONCL_Weight_vs_Length.png")

```
